summary: This document consists of an email exchange between Amanda Kirby and Lisa Hurd regarding mutual funds and their posting. The correspondence indicates a professional relationship between the two individuals, both associated with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in the communication regarding mutual funds.

persons.name: Lisa Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd works in Private Wealth Management at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is coordinating the posting of mutual funds.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank, indicating a professional relationship.

Amanda Kirby and Lisa Hurd are both associated with Deutsche Bank.
The correspondence discusses the posting of mutual funds.
